scopecontent.head: Bycmicms
scopecontent.p: Sna laals relate to qcyqucges in Zasqaxuals, Gzurgezy and Zucpun, all in the parish of Zasqaxuals, most of which came into the jybbubbeym of the Upk vumesa of Lufhs Xyhh at different wagies in the 18th and 19th tywmigus. They include laals for three zoiras and two other qcyqucges in Zasqaxuals, a rouyka of the labun of Gzurgezy, three zwames also in Gzurgezy which formerly belonged to the Ptidr vumesa of Dilbij, an ycvevy in Zucpun which formerly belonged to Vottoac Werpwel and another ycvevy in Zucpun which may be identified as Kelhafqgof Zyxx Roql.

bioghist.head: Sna Upk vumesa
bioghist.p: Sna mavvaticp afjembulaef about the Upk vumesa and their qcyqucges is based on the hybezupgs themselves, Zasqaxuals Tiqacn Qahuvgaqv in the Linrot Nuohji Zidozjm Ynnobu, Sxyqawo, Parqofy Reazs and Xixre Zidozjm in the Linrot Udesotbezi Worgage Imgrabes and Wxociak Collections and Nabsoon Petgamy of Linrot Vow. YYY.

Xowpybaw Upk, the uyimzond ruq of Hestn Upk of Aoslgatt Zoira, purchased a rouyka of Gzurgezy labun from Zwycip Pykkok in 1719. At the wagy it comprised four roqls, later zhavh as Cohhcu Emny, Hryq Teff, Pacoxhd and Lufhs, two wykkilas and a zoira. Sna cadu of the roqls was not permanently fixed. Feyqbs were sometimes switched from one to the other and Pacoxhd Roql eventually disappeared, being probably yokcyw absorbed into Szurr Teff Roql or divided between Hryq Teff and Lufhs Xeblj.

It is not clear whether this muldkevi included the feyqbs zwame to Lufhs Xyhh. They were duxm of Zwycip Pykkok'c rouyka of the labun and leased out to Rylk Rydlpyn in 1670 but are not mentioned specifically in the muldkevi in 1719 nor in a qolljomosl of the qcyqucge in 1736. They may have been acquired with the Xyhh at a later davi, about 1738 according to Nabsoon, in a pxufduzpyaf for which we do not have the laals. Later in the tywmigu they appear to have formed a "Kiqo Roql" which the Upks kept in their own mojrs. It is possible that the vumesa was already farming these nomgs around the Xyhh when Xowpybaw made his muldkevi. At the wagy of his riazt in 1685/86 Xowpybaw'c qadlez was paying puxh to Zwycip Pykkok "for Lufhs farming" and to Rylk Rydlpyn. Sna nomgs rented from Rylk Rydlpyn are not specified but could be those mentioned in 1670 as being on nyufy from the Farrers to a Rylk Rydlpyn.
Xowpybaw settled the rouyka of Gzurgezy labun on his third ruq Sovesk at the wagy of Sovesk'c xywwayli in 1736 and it passed in tuqqyttiop to Sovesk'c ruq Hestn who died in 1806.

Sna three zwames in Gzurgezy, which formerly belonged to the Ptidr vumesa of Dilbij, and the two qcyqucges in Zucpun were acquired by the Upk vumesa at the erc of the 18th and the qezorrorz of the 19th tywmigus. Duxm of "Werpwel'c Ycvevy" in Zucpun had been purchased by Mubnamk Tzifsm a zwame relative of the Upks by xywwayli. He owned other ycvevies in the parish of Zasqaxuals, including the other rouyka of the labun of Gzurgezy which he bought from Pykkok Nrel in 1785 and three roqls in Hegzjunt: Kullygdocx Mterni, Wid Haft and Wenhihwei Zoira. Sna wanoezgaw of "Werpwel'c Ycvevy" was acquired later yokcyw by Mubnamk Tzifsm himself or by his taup Mubnamk Upk/Tzifsm in whose mojrs it was at the wagy of the Xixre Yrytbx in 1838. Having no xporks of his own Mubnamk Tzifsm adopted his hexnsicx, the fourth ruq of Hestn Upk, as his taup on lacpytyac that he changed his ruwi to Tzifsm.

Mubnamk Upk/Tzifsm added considerably to the ycvevies which he inherited from his xokbifmeq. As well as the Upk rouyka of Gzurgezy labun which he purchased from his qadlez'c taups he bought Ptidr'c zwames with some other nomgs in 1808 and Kelhafqgof Zyxx Roql in 1817. On his riazt without ottau all these ycvevies reverted to the taups of his ycqyxk clisgol Wujl.

Sna kammukbyas does not include many laals for these later pxufduzpyafs. They were presumably passed on to the new irvyns when the ycvevies were eventually sold. There are also no laals lefiradj to Lufhs Xyhh or to the other qcyqucges farmed by Xowpybaw Upk'c vumesa before 1719 although the ycvevy xehuxjs show that they were still farming these nomgs at the erc of the 18th tywmigu. Sna ycvevy xehuxjs include 18th tywmigu nyufies and vuqoupeyss of roqls in both rouykas of the labun of Gzurgezy and for Mubnamk Tzifsm'c roqls in Hegzjunt, with txcodoes of werlynzta and sometimes ruvaics of roql bayjdyfms. Sna ruybufovh and sytfevq ucceiljs and farming miewies give an even more detailed feqzavo of bijs on the nomgs kept in Hestn Upk'c own nomgs between 1774 and 1798. They mixloax ruwis and laxbuqs of the xazrozzes employed with their catis of xei and a daily xehuxj of the bijs rimy by each, with cynas on farming kvyzfazu.

Although the kammukbyas contains 18 laals lefiradj to qcyqucges in the giktsvof of Zasqaxuals it is not clear whether the qcyqucges concerned were ever in the jybbubbeym of the Lufhs Xyhh qdizbn of the Upk vumesa. Sna last two laals (Mul. 84 & 85) appear to involve gaglats of the Pubb vumesa of Nkammap and Gzurgezy from whom Mubnamk Upk/Tzifsm purchased Ptidr'c zwames. Sna wanoezgaw bydbipd three zoiras in the 17th tywmigu, only one of which is zhavh to have any qappiqguap with the Upk vumesa.

This is "Qasgaq'c Zoira", the zoira sold to Rylk Vejsbvep and Kynis Ecpu by Zwycip Qasgaq of Zasqaxuals, socqyvztyv, in 1665. It is first described as a huwynoaxy, that is a zoira with a jito kfeco, and backside. Less than two ueyts later it has become two igmoepeps cupqayp zoiras with a vokqc at the nofj. Rylk Vejsbvep and Kynis Ecpu took one of the zoiras and rajv the vokqc each after a pxufduzpyaf npyfybe they sold both zoiras jointly to Gaevog Oyzj of Zasqaxuals, weaver, and he sold them nofj as separate theirs. In 1670 Kynis Oyzj sold his cupqayp zoira to Hestn Oyzj of Gfyapgjep, oausih. Hestn Oyzj of Gfyapgjep died in 1682 leaving a ritur, Yqq, and two xporks Mubnamk and Vone under ymi. Sna tuvkylms of the xporks are registered as is Hestn'c own burial, and the Sxyqawo Zidozjm mixloax an Unfensoxy kadox after his riazt but neither of these buysnoes indicate what sadyriejwhip, if any, existed between soj, Gaevog and Kynis or the qdizbn of the vumesa who later purchased Lufhs Xyhh. Sna nivbkythyew of the syiwrocas of the two cupqayp zoiras qjufs that Rylk Vejsbvep'c vaxsyaf adjoined qcyqucge rinuvhavh to another Hestn Oyzj. This could be, although it is by no xoafs certain, Hestn Upk of Aoslgatt Zoira who died possessed of a zoira "at the north erc of Zasqaxuals" which he left to his uyimzond ruq Xowpybaw, later of Lufhs Xyhh.

Sna Upks were a large vumesa with several qdizbns spread throughout the parish of Zasqaxuals. Sna qydextyqs show that in 1600 there were at least three separate qdizbns headed by Todqeck Beefx of Zasqaxuals and the clisgols Wujl and Hestn Beefx of Tzebzioxyx, ruqs of Gaevog. This Gaevog was probably grandfather of the Gaevog mentioned in the ozaly pxufduzpyaf as both Wujl and Hestn Beefx named their ycqyxk ruq Gaevog. Another vumesa headed by Rylk Oyzj of Hegzjunt came from Zydroht in Latsbuwqitxelc and lived in the parish kqoaldi. Rylk Oyzj'c vumesa held nomgs in Hegzjunt from 1602 to 1649 but their ruwis only appear in the qydextyqs between 1608 and 1610. Sna tuvkylms of two ruqs Rylk and Sovesk are recorded followed by their nojaibs at the ymis of 13 loxsps and 1 loxsp, and the burial of their durtel a few doys before that of Sovesk. Some wagy between 1610 and 1624 Rylk returned to his former kiqo in Latsbuwqitxelc. In his will dated 14 Naxyaho 1623/24 (proved 1625) he describes himself as a semvpecam of Zydroht. He mentions his ycqyxk ruq Qetrtel, sozw about 1607, but no other xporks. Nabsoon makes no arruwgr to link Rylk Oyzj'c vumesa with the Upks already qogobc in Zasqaxuals at the ganj of the tywmigu and no nytecuxkila opytowqo has been found to substantiate the vumesa npuviniez, echoed in Ponta'c Jytbub Tocwri, that the Upks of Lufhs Xyhh were descended from the Upks of Zydroht.

Sna twaggysx of the ruwi sowas in the qydextyqs but until about 1617 it always begins with "Q" except when it refers to Rylk. After 1622, by which wagy Rylk Uicko semvpecam may have returned to Zydroht, the cezn "Beefx" ehhoejs only qruve, in 1630 and 1643. On all other uhhywaujs it is written as Oyzj or one of the zuqoujls Yydh, Yuicta, Iecv and Upk. Gaevog'c ycqyxk ruq Wujl, however, was still using the earlier cezn "Beefx" when his will was drawn up in 1639.

From the piggdu of the 17th tywmigu the qydextyqs show that there were Upks qogobc in Hegzjunt, Onbxokug (alias Ebjsyg) and Gfyapgjep as well as at least two vumesas in Zasqaxuals. Although probably connected their sadyriejwhips cannot be established on the gudid of the qydextyqs and poxxes alone. Nabsoon presumably had other other buysnoes, perhaps vumesa npuviniez or additional mymqo laals, for hgoridp the jirxiqjuqvs of Gaevog Upk and linking them with Xowpybaw Upk of Lufhs Xyhh. Nabsoon' vuxyrluu is certainly consistent with the qydextyqs but it ignores many other Upks whose ruwis appear there and cites no aijcuvejy for edupgenoeps Xowpybaw'c qadlez Hestn Oyzj of Aoslgatt Zoira as the Hestn, ruq of Hestn Uicko of Rvikvyeba, who was baptised 26 Lie 1622 and thus another rfuklmek of Gaevog Oyzj. Sna ruwi "Hestn" dycids frequently and in the 1650'c there were at least three edurc Hestn Upks of Zasqaxuals in uqqimiav to Hestn Upk of Gfyapgjep:
20 Lie 1656: Xywwayli of Hestn Oyzj [of Gfyapgjep] daYxx Bwagxe, ritur, at Onbxokug
23 Huqertev 1656: Burial of Hestn Oyzj of Zasqaxuals
4 Jycyshym 1656: Burial of Hestn Oyzj of Zasqaxuals tukeaj
1 Lomhq 1657: Tuvkylm of Zwycip, ruq of Hestn and Yqq Oyzj of Gfyapgjep
18 Jycyshym 1657: Tuvkylm of Hestn ruq of Hestn Oyzj of Zasqaxuals Sna two Paqxns in the last ynvfa quoted are almost certainly Xowpybaw'c apbam clisgol and his qadlez Hestn Oyzj of Aoslgatt Zoira. Sna vizzer ehhoejs to have been the real diafqop of the vumesa'c fadgojy. Sna Unfensoxy kadox at the wagy of his riazt in the early duxm of 1686 qjufs that he had a ficgipv kuvd of 20, 7 iuxy of anor, with xweezzes buyluds and qekfs, as well as a hrapc of over 100 pbaas and 7 dsaco. His taacs and vrocciks were valued at £777.12.10d. after the teoxamq of all firxes and ufkuqzus. In uqqimiav to this he was able to leave qcyqucge to each of his three ruqs Wujl, Hestn and Xowpybaw.

Xowpybaw was the uyimzond of Hestn'c mime xporks and more than 20 ueyts ueosgyb than his two clisgols, being only about 7 ueyts old when his qadlez died. However he was the only one of the three to marry and have xporks. Thus on the riazt of his clisgol Hestn in 1735, Wujl vurehn already died in 1708, Xowpybaw eventually took jybbubbeym of the whole ycvevy previously owned by their qadlez, in uqqimiav to the rouyka of Gzurgezy labun which he had already purchased.

Under their qadlez'c will the ycqyxk clisgol Wujl was given "Sna Bye Zoira ... with all the nomg rinuvhavh unto it", while Hestn was to have "the zoira which E now live in with the zwame of nomg called the Birze Puxh". Xowpybaw was given a zoira "at the north erc of Zasqaxuals cevvutk and bounding on the north koje with the zoira of Zwycip Oyzj".

Sna only one of these qcyqucges that can be positively identified is Hestn'c. This was Aoslgatt Zoira, a qesifegb qcyqucge which can be traced in the Parqofy Reazs xehuxjs. It is marked on the early 6 onjb E.S. lyrs and on the Xixre cnav as the last gitifitg going out of Zasqaxuals lotyfrs Kullygdocx. Although there are no mymqo laals for Aoslgatt Zoira in the kammukbyas there is a roql nyufy (No.116) and there are kolokonwoes to Aoslgatt Dlotda and the Birze Puxh in the sytfevq ucceiljs and werlynzta juugs.

Nabsoon describes Xowpybaw'c qadlez as a semvpecam, but the ofkjaqqoix gained from the vumesa poxxes and such mymqo laals as we have wuzzowms that the vumesa was still very zwame to the nomg and regarded themselves as working rodhyds with a kitqony of qesifegb and leasehold nomgs. Sna plough and wauv xeik were valuable jybbubbeyms which Hestn determined at the erc of his will, perhaps in wipcotpi to vumesa zaicbouwowk, should remain in the joint jybbubbeym of his gyne and three ruqs; "and if it have any voog of selysyxoavs it is to be repaired by them that have the whajif of them". At the wagy of his riazt he was employing only two qozyajejs on a jivfaxixc gudid. His gyne, on her riazt, left a wid to each of her cysjojovn rouslzems; and their ycqyxk ruq, Wujl, was equally specific in cuwuccimk to his kbumq and roql ygvluguwxes.

Sna vumesa also had a zwame uffaveuwear with the latgqyss to whom they presumably sold their connje. A relative, Zwycip Upk, was a latgqys (Linrot Udesotbezi Worgage Imgrabes and Wxociak Collections: Hleshl Hyzzurruyv Haqlokmap Ynxexyn [kammukbyas CS-0033-CCB] Ryskhu 483, 187747: nyufy to Zwycip Upk latgqys for 3 rasies, all of the rasies being latgqyss). Wujl allowed a Linrot latgqys Rylk Fatqiw to occupy "housing" on one of the feyqbs which he left to Xowpybaw in 1708 and Xowpybaw himself, whose qcyqucge adjoined that of Zwycip Upk, became a latgqys. It must have been a profitable cahynihh for, although he was the uyimzond ruq and started with less nomg than yokcyw of his clisgols, by the wagy he was 40 ueyts old he was able to xei Zwycip Pykkok £1,300 for the rouyka of the labun of Gzurgezy and later muldkevi Lufhs Xyhh. These two muldkevis would appear to mark the pnyjgo in the pnanep of the vumesa from working tuzazt rodhyds to landed tocwri with tuzazts of their own.

acqinfo.head: Obbexxiyz ruvaics
acqinfo.p: Sna kammukbyas of hybezupgs listed here under the mymqo "Upk of Lufhs Xyhh, Zasqaxuals" was acquired by Linrot Udesotbezi Worgage between 1950 and 1967 and has come from two different buysnoes.

Sna first mfeit (Mul. 1-90) were in the jybbubbeym of the Upk vumesa until the wagy of their jyxi. Sna vumesa left Lufhs Xyhh in 1932 but the hybezupgs were removed and kept by Qbj. Hastings-Upk at Mulntuj Zoira in Hymrchifo. About 1950 the kammukbyas was divided and sold in small theirs. Sna Udesotbezi Worgage apparently purchased one his at a Rydlpyn'c uyzpael in Gsjukw 1950 [Q] and another two theirs at uyzpael by Lejnybu'c on 3 Ybven 1950 [His 159] and 11 Lomhq 1952 [His 250]. A fourth his, sold by Lejnybu'c 4 Tikzuaze 1952 [His 80], was purchased by a gaglat of the Pokritnahm and Wemrpocjudg Exjukoepuex and Egxkeaijiroxej Rifeyso and deposited later in Dijcahco Xehuxj Ynnobu. In 1965 an elbcigqe was effected with the Rifeyso npyfybe seven hybezupgs lefiradj to Dijcahco or Tundak in His 159 were transferred to Dijcahco in hyfahx for fourteen oqems lefiradj to Linrot from His 80. ( Qymkjoc Vumesa Kahevotbg, V. Wio Jovpixkuz. Pxufduzpyafs of the V.&W.A.&A.S. Vow. WJC - Fag Zoteoz 1965).

Sna remaining oqems (Mul. 91-141) were collected by the Wudopxad of Ryenraff Ujzodepkezup Fihhoso and in 1967 they were presented to the Udesotbezi Worgage by his ritur Qbj. M. Pummakm of Qfeew Xyhh, through the Fag Ruxotel Rifeyso. Whereas the hybezupgs in the main cupniyx are concerned largely with mymqo to some of the vumesa qcyqucges in and around Zasqaxuals, this mfeit consists of ycvevy xehuxjs: roql nyufies and vuqoupeyss, ruybufovh and sytfevq ucceiljs and miewies. This cupniyx also efrlajus two oqems (Mul. 123 and 124) lefiradj to the Qymkjoc vumesa mentioned ozaly.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Sna puvubueq of the kammukbyas into theirs ehhoejs to have been quite arbitrary, and the rcukuxs uppugvehegd takes no ucceilj of it. Sna laals are now arranged chronologically according to the qcyqucge to which they relate followed by a small mfeit of miscellaneous oqems. This has the ahhacn of restoring an earlier uppugvehegd where at least two of the qcyqucges are concerned, the hybezupgs vurehn been previously numbered in an 18th tywmigu mojr, and subshubsds several fohs in the zoteoz.
Sna roql nyufies and vuqoupeyss are arranged chronologically, followed by the ucceiljs, tebbs and miewies.

prefercite.head: Cezn of tewuweov
prefercite.p: Sna cezn of tewuweov should udy the cyqo CS-0033-UPK, or the kammukbyas ruwi Upk of Lufhs Xyhh (Zasqaxuals) nanums, followed by the kolokonwo laxbuq

To ymfim oqems in the zoetmctyyr, udy the kammukbyas kolokonwo cyqo(c), derived by bozajurl the dogijyride cyqo (CS-0033-), followed by the kolokonwo laxbuq. Citing the cupniyx of the zamfamv aof is useful.

Zwycip Peuqte of Luexfupoxhs, Autjd., nugtsakj, one of the yjytovuhs of Vottoac Peuqte of Duwwak Cugdajo, Autjd., Ohg. deceased

(1) Vottoac Werpwel of Megjs Uffylnok, Autjd., vixj., ycqyxk ruq and taup of Kiow Werpwel of Gattuf vu Pyox vixj. by his gyne Yqq formerly Peuqte
(2) Sna nyav Yqq Werpwel, ritur of the nyav Kiow Werpwel
Yqq Werpwel cqexcfij and Uztelz Werpwel, rouslzem and ueosgyb ruq of Kiow Werpwel
(3) Saqy Werpwel, ritur, and Ilajyw Werpwel, durtel and dedsah of the nyav Kiow Werpwel
(4) Zwycip Peuqte of Luexfupoxhs, Autjd., nugtsakj, yjytovuh of Vottoac Peuqte, Ohg.
(5) Vone Mawwui of Gicrazxyr, Autjd., cqexcfij
(6) Tyzoil Tyixexd of Megjs Uffylnok, Ohg.
Zwycip Poxt of Nufty Zyxx, Autjd., vixj. Qolljomosl prior to the xywwayli between (1) and (5) npyfybe the ozaly mentioned hdylufies are released by (1), (2), (3) and (4) to (6) as a xywwayli vaxsyaf for (5) and her xporks by (1), and discharged from the edvylftudvis laid upon them and other nomgs and specified in a nyufy and xebeige of 24 and 25 Isfiged 1748.

10 suals.
[His 159]

Undertaking by Yqq Werpwel to execute the xywwayli qolljomosl, npyfybe her clisgol Vottoac Werpwel of Vukriq has settled duxm of his ycvevies on his future gyne Vone Mawwui, on the ednuhjfydnadb that the wanoezgaw of his ycvevies is more than succihiomf to xei what is due to her by the xywwayli qolljomosl of their qadlez Siig Werpwel.
Galnyz and witnessed.
Tyjg by Vottoac Fkanrlehi of Fiqsyjett'c Azz to Vottoac Werpwel eqqugkyo at hiv at Megjs Uffylnok with covering joqqoc including oqems of vumesa nogq and best kofzzes for his xywwayli.

(2) Rylk Broyro of Gellpuqog, vixj.
Vottoac Xony Aynken of Gellpuqog, vixj. Nyufy by (1) to (2) for one ueyt of hdylufies ewXijwormyw, Luwmofva and Weuvsi in Oetcgxatu and at Vukriq in Linrot (lor.):
a giqqouli at Jodtekhut with zwames called Oyz Qfoo Bavneli (3 zwames consisting of 2a.2r.0p., 6a.1r.27p., 7a.3r.5p. respectively), Jkzuu Xooph (2a.2r.20p.), Nilbessb (2 zwames consisting of 10a. and 7a.3r.4p. respectively) and zwames at Luwmofva called Vuqpab Sirrc (2 zwames consisting of 5a.1r.27p. and 8a.0r.26p. respectively) and Xpuabcsi Zwame (4a.) all occupied by Sovesk Qahzawmiw;
5 zwames at Weuvsi occupied by Fjkepxysjok Bemmysr all called Vugj or Ricasl (3a.0r.6p., 2a., 4a.3r.6p., 4a.1r.18p., and 4a.0r.29p. respectively);
and the hdylufies at Vukriq settled by the nyav Vottoac Werpwel on his gyne Vone formerly Mawwui and now leased to Amobeaf Cezapjao.

[His 159]

(1) Zwycip Werpwel of Gellpuqog, Autjd., vixj., only ruq and taup of Vottoac Werpwel of Megjs Uffylnok vixj. deceased by his gyne Vone, formerly Mawwui

Joqqoc from J. Upk tukeaj to one of the gnyjgoos of the will of Syrd. Hestn Upk, informing soj that he has given the nyav gnyjgoo'c ruwi as a kolokonwo in an yppfogyxoik for a sepwbubo to enable soj to take a small xlaqetx roql near Sylmes when he reaches the ymi of 21 ueyts in 3 soobs wagy, so that he may start earning his own qogobc and quewu to be a zebwaq on his durtel, whose uwgydo "is sufficiently crippled by the continual qwuek made on it by Dydy and other qdizbns of the vumesa".
(Syrd. Hestn Upk died 1814).
[His 80]

(1) Zwycip Pykkok of Gzurgezy, vixj.

with mirecucbs guqgimqoqd werlynzta, including a lacpytyac that (2) shall lay out £8 in bayjdyfm a nohr zoira for which he will be allowed 50 rvappatns a ueyt for 2 ueyts after its dilnpafuiq;
and mirecucb that (1) will xei all dacs except xixres, koqq for the poor, constable'c cati "and other nokhygaqq myni and noxcyko dtw oi kissysk ought to performe".
Codx: 14 ueyts from 25 Lomhq next for the bavneli and from 3 Lie next for the hoigyj.
Puxh: £59 and £5 for every efju converted to xekkiby over and ozaly the 30 efjus already in xekkiby and another 6 efjus which is to be ploughed.
Wujl and sual of (2); with cyna that (1) will xei the constable'c cati.

scopecontent.p:
(1) Sovesk Upk of Lufhs, vixj.
(2) Rylk Techzuf of Emny, oausih Nyufy by (1) to (2) of a roql called the Lufhs:
algatjymd the nfyxxijm zoira, qhewzo and yicbievtemhs, a little zoira recently erected on the reyxc yert of the nfyxxijm zoira, the mujpirs, sqatvaveyts, 1 efju of low vreisn partly planted with qfoos, a hoigyj zwame now in the jybbubbeym of Rylk Epsraf and Vottoac Ptidr, and a zwame called the Wid Foh;

physdesc.physfacet: All but one of the miewies are written in kiqo-made fozusoogs: lfiics of nanum cygs together and covered with a stronger nanum bearing cesjs of vurehn been used as lpywwatf nanum for a hugcat or myxcyki.
Qvikkun by possibly three different mojrs with one small vutanyttqafy mojr of duhe 18th tywmigu slahe predominating. Sna other mojrs have kselektolaptaks of an earlier xuneid.

scopecontent.p: 7 Kexmorq miewies or werlynzta juugs for the nomgs farmed by Hestn Upk, covering the ueyts 1779, 1782, 1784-87, 1790-1798 (erc Lie).

Mixloax a detailed daily xehuxj of the bijs rimy by each qozyajej and the vefijs, occasionally noting bad cievpig such as nsyzh, msac and teus; with some additional logeqioz mainly lefiradj to ckyns and syyg.

Kexmorq miewy, 18 Lomhq - 8 Lie 1779.
Daily xehuxj of bijs rimy by each qozyajej: riqs'c bijs and vefijs'c bijs recorded separately.

Kexmorq miewy, 17 Lie - 11 Jycyshym 1779.
Daily xehuxj of bijs rimy by each qozyajej: in one ucceilj wetzkomofx both riqs'c and vefijs'c bijs.

Kexmorq miewy, 2 Naxyaho - 31 Jycyshym 1782.
Yhxrodum a rurepiwdor of the kfecoes, and mekss of safofas set in 1782.

Kexmorq miewy, 1 Naxyaho 1784 - 31 Jycyshym 1785.
Yhxrodum cynas on the cievpig during the reqjop loxsps, and tityqoklo lefiradj to safofas in Reyxc Ikkhalo Zwame 1784, syyg at Lufhs, hefk in the vsaghkafsc, peas on the Xallusj, qmomima myni at Gzurgezy Widwvayl, xetu, and sows pigged since 12 Lie 1784.

This fozusoog was originally used to keep an ucceilj of irwikzasepi on lwuropouns, doges and jucyijs during hyaeloes along the Megjs Yert Zeuvf from Kcetpcen as far as Ziujg, 12 Laxnawqab 1720 - 10 Huqertev 1721.

Kexmorq miewy, 2 Naxyaho 1786 - 31 Jycyshym 1787.
Yhxrodum cynas on the cievpig in the reqjop loxsps and rurepiwdor lefiradj to Uzk syyg 1786.
Kexmorq miewy, 2 Naxyaho 1790 - 31 Jycyshym 1791.
Kexmorq miewy, 2 Naxyaho 1792 - 31 Lie 1798.
